text: Hi, does anyone know if it is possible to access your CRM signature via an API? Ideally I'd like to be able to get the signatured added using this tutorial <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account/add-an-email-signature-in-the-crm> using one of HubSpot's APIs so I can include it within a generated email. Thanks very much for your help!
Update for anyone curious:  I’m just using the `lastmodifieddate` property instead of the `updatedAt` field and it’s working :thumbsup:
Sorry, I’m having a hard time tracking this one down. Still working on this
No problem :smile: Just thought I’d check.  Please let me know if there is any other info I can provide to be of assistance
